mean_cn: n. 文艺复兴；新生，复兴
mean_en: the Renaissance the period in Europe during the 14th, 15th and 16th centuries when people became interested in the ideas and culture of ancient Greece and Rome and used these influences in their own art, literature, etc.
sentence: Many masterpieces were created during the Renaissance.
sentence_trans: 文艺复兴时期杰作层出不穷。
word_etyma: re重新 + naiss诞生 + ance表名词，情况、性质、行为 → renaissance复活，复兴，文艺复兴
